titleInfo.title: 'ROUGH MAP OF OLD AND NEW BED OF HELMUND RIVER To Illustrate British Consul's Tour, 30 September 1902.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 470 x 300 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: The map shows the old and new beds of the Helmand River, and its junction with the Rud-i-Pariun near the disputed frontier between Afghanistan and Persia in Sistan.Imprint: ' I. B. [Intelligence Branch] Topo. Dy. No. 4,515. Exd. C. J. A.'Distinctive features: signed by Major Robert Arthur Edward Benn, His Britannic Majesty's Consul, Seistan; shows 'Present main Bed of Helmund River'; 'Old Bed of Helmund River'; 'Bunds'; [route of] 'Major Benn's Tour'; and 'Goldsmid's Boundary'.
